Plot: The classic Shakespearean play about a murderously scheming king staged in an alternative fascist England setting.
Title: Richard III
Writer: William Shakespeare (play), Ian McKellen, Richard Loncraine
Actors: Ian McKellen, Annette Bening, Jim Broadbent, Robert Downey Jr.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 10 nominations.
